titleStmt.title: Thomas E. Bramlette to Charles D. Pennebaker
CWG13939

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 10 ; 10 Feb - 16 March 1865

body.p: Papers of the Warren Co Committee in regard to a correction of their quota referred to Col C. D Pennebaker state agent at Washington D C Feby 23d 1865

State of Kentucky
Executive Department
Frankfort Ky
Febry 23d 1865

Respectfully referred to Col C. D. Pennebaker State Agent, who will at once submit these -- papers to Brig General James B Fry. Pro Mars Genl U S. and request that an order be issued changing the quota assigned Warren Co Ky, in accordance with the within statements.

Tho E Bramlette
Governor of Ky
